news.title: More than 200 MPs call for Starmer to recognise Palestinian state
news.summary: More than 130 Labour MPs are among the signatories piling fresh pressure on PM Sir Keir Starmer.

news.title: Top Boy actor Micheal Ward charged with rape
news.summary: The Bafta winner, who faces rape and sexual assault allegations, denies "the charges against me entirely".

news.title: NHS faces challenging few days during doctors strike, warns Streeting
news.summary: Hospitals in England battle to keep both emergency and non-urgent work going in five-day walkout.

news.title: South Park creator makes mock apology to Trump after White House attacks episode
news.summary: The White House said an episode ridiculing Donald Trump was "a desperate attempt for attention".

news.title: River Island plans to close 33 shops - but why is it in trouble?
news.summary: The future of the chain is in the balance ahead of a crucial court ruling on its restructuring plans.

news.title: Watch: How inquest into Jay Slater's death unfolded
news.summary: The BBC's Fiona Trott explains a coroner's conclusions about the 19-year-old's death last year.

news.title: UK ban on Palestine Action a 'disturbing' misuse of legislation, says UN rights chief
news.summary: Volker Turk urges the UK government to lift the "unnecessary" ban on the group.

news.title: Around 6,000 porn sites start checking ages in UK
news.summary: Despite the law some remain sceptical about the effectiveness of porn age checks.

news.title: Failings in care of ex-cricketer Graham Thorpe before he died, coroner says
news.summary: The ex-cricketer's wife said his mental health declined after losing his job as a batting coach.

news.title: Two teens who murdered boy, 14, on London bus sentenced to life
news.summary: Kelyan Bokassa was stabbed 27 times as he travelled home on a bus in south-east London on 7 January.
